issue.title: [CF 625] Monk Chi (using Burning Embers example)
issue.body:
Following the Warlock Burning Embers example here:

http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/forum/warlock/42454-destruction-track-burning-embers/#p1

Are you able to do the same with Monk Chi and post it in the Monk examples thread before MoP is released?  Just a request and I understand you are probably busy, but thank you just the same.


> Posted by CurseForge user Adapted | Imported from CurseForge issue #625 | Raw
